chatbot.title: Museum Booking Assistant
chatbot.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
chatbot.museumPrompt: Please select a museum to visit:
chatbot.unhandledResponse: I'm not sure how to help with that. Would you like to start booking tickets?

conversation.greeting: Hello! I'm your museum booking assistant. I can help you book tickets, check museum timings, or answer any questions you have.
conversation.nameAsk: To get started, may I know your name?
conversation.nameConfirm: Nice to meet you, {{name}}! How can I assist you today?
conversation.emailAsk: Could you please share your email address for the booking confirmation?
conversation.emailConfirm: Thank you! I'll send the booking confirmation to {{email}}.
conversation.phoneAsk: Could I have your phone number for important updates about your visit?
conversation.phoneConfirm: Perfect! I'll send any important updates to {{phone}}.
conversation.museumSelect: Which museum would you like to visit? I can help you choose based on your interests.
conversation.dateAsk: When would you like to visit? I can show you available dates and peak times.
conversation.visitorAsk: How many visitors will be joining? We have special rates for children and seniors.
conversation.confirmBooking: Great! I've got all the details. Would you like to proceed with the booking?
conversation.paymentPrompt: Please select your preferred payment method to complete the booking.
conversation.bookingSuccess: Wonderful! Your booking is confirmed. I've sent the details to your email.
conversation.helpOffer: Is there anything else you'd like to know about your visit?

errors.invalidName: I didn't quite catch that. Could you please provide your full name?
errors.invalidEmail: That email address doesn't look quite right. Could you please check and try again?
errors.invalidPhone: I need a valid phone number to proceed. Please provide a number with country code.
errors.bookingFailed: I apologize, but I couldn't complete the booking. Shall we try again?

welcome: Hello! Welcome to the Museum Ticket Booking Assistant. How can I help you today?
greetUser: Nice to meet you, {{name}}! How can I assist you today?
bookingQuestion: Would you like to book museum tickets?
dateQuestion: For which date would you like to book your visit?
ticketTypeQuestion: How many tickets do you need, and for which age group?
tourQuestion: Would you like to add any guided tours or special exhibit access?
totalPrice: Your total price is ₹{{amount}}. Would you like to proceed with the payment?
paymentSuccess: Payment successful! Your booking has been confirmed.
deliveryMethod: Would you like to receive your ticket via email or SMS?
ticketInstructions: Please present this ticket at the museum entrance. Enjoy your visit!
helpQuestion: Can I help you with anything else today, {{name}}?
thankYou: Thank you for using the Museum Ticket Booking Assistant. Have a great visit!
typeMessage: Type your message or select an option below...

hero.title: Discover Our Rich Cultural Heritage
hero.subtitle: Experience the beauty of art, history, and culture at the National Museum.
